title: Is it compulsory to submit a Master's degree certificate to WES in University envelope? I have my transcripts from university in a sealed envelope but the transcript certificate doesn't have degree certificate? - Quora

response.answer_text: See, first you need to send transcripts from University directly. That can be done by posting transcripts from University post office. Next, you need to send photocopies of degrees which you are getting evaluated. For that, send your degree in a separate envelope. In my case, I sent transcripts from University post office and degree (photocopy) from a post office near my home. Hope it helps! All the best.

You can directly send the copy of degree certificate to WES. They only need the marksheet transcripts from university in a sealed envelope and mail them directly through University. For degree certificate you can send it directly. Refer to Wes documents sending procedure in Wes site.
